data.text:
Good Hotel and great ambience 
Typical business hotel neat and clean and willing to help

Breakfast is ok nothing exceptional to comment 
Location wise good and easy to manure around the city

Staff is very co-operative and willing to help 
Rooms are clean and well maintained
data.title: Went for an exhibition

data.text: I had a very comfortable stay at atrium hotel. The staff were friendly and helpful. The welcoming was great. Very nice ambiance. The hotel is kids friendly and has wide room. I think this was our 4th trip to this hotel.
data.title: Amazing

data.text:
Our stay was out of this world. No pictures, videos, testimonials online do the place justice. Completely unreal. Blessed to have stayed at many nice places, and this one with the views, the niceties, the level of friendly service was top notch. Food was outstanding in every outlet. Was a long trip to get there but worth every minute of it. Will go back for sure.
Everything was extraordinary! We enjoyed our stay. We love the hospitality! The room cleaning staff is amazing! We are definitely going to return! Thank you for taking care of us! We hope to share our experience with our family and My friend Girish -General Manager
data.title: World Class Hospitality

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Rajesh,
We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us, and we are absolutely thrilled to hear that your experience at Fortune Atrium exceeded your expectations.
It warms our hearts to know that our staff and service left such a positive impression on you, making us your favorite among the 4-star hotels in Dubai. Your recognition of our team's efforts, from check-in to check-out, is a testament to the dedication and commitment we have towards providing exceptional experiences for our guests.
We are delighted that our contributions to your stay were memorable. We will certainly pass on your kind words to the entire team. Your appreciation serves as a great motivator for us to continue striving for excellence in everything we do.
Once again, thank you for your loyalty and for taking the time to share your feedback. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!
Warm regards,
Fortune Family
owner_response.author: General Manager

data.text:
Everything in Fortune is amazing all the staffâ€™s including Pavan,Adil,Anish,Muzaffar and Kamala never disappoints every time I visit. The rooms are good enough for a couple they go beyond their limit to make our visit memorable one. Even the managers Mr. Bharath and Mr. Shafiq look into every details and makes our stay a memorable one.
Will recommend everyone Fortune never disappoints.
data.title: Fortune never disappoints

data.text:
Rooms are hygienically cleaned with all amenities required by a business traveller as well as leisure traveller. 
The food quality is excellent taste with mouth watering and reasonable price. 
GM Mr Girish taken care all our requirements. Never seen a GM interaction with almost all guest while he is available in property. I have been travelling across the all continents but he is the best. 
Good luck to team member our complete team will visit again.
data.title: New Generation Style Hotel
